mapper.select: SELECT OPINIONNO, TITLE, LINK, IMAGEURL, COLUMNIST, CONTENT, PUBDATE FROM OPINION ORDER BY OPINIONNO DESC
SELECT OPINIONNO, TITLE, LINK, IMAGEURL, COLUMNIST, CONTENT, PUBDATE FROM OPINION WHERE OPINIONNO = 15
SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT OPINIONNO, TITLE, LINK, IMAGEURL, COLUMNIST, CONTENT, PUBDATE FROM OPINION ORDER BY HIT DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT OPINIONNO, TITLE, IMAGEURL, COLUMNIST, PUBDATE FROM OPINION ORDER BY PUBDATE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT OPINIONNO, TITLE, IMAGEURL, PUBDATE FROM OPINION WHERE ROWNUM <= 2 ORDER BY OPINIONNO DESC ) A

SELECT OPI.OPINIONNO, OPI.TITLE, OPI.COLUMNIST, OPI.IMAGEURL, OPI.HIT, OPI.CONTENT, OPI.PUBDATE, U.USER_ID AS OPR_USER_ID, OPR.O_REPLY_NO AS OPR_O_REPLY_NO, OPR.OPINIONNO AS OPR_OPINIONNO, OPR.O_REPLY_CONTENT AS OPR_O_REPLY_CONTENT, OPR.O_WRITER_NO AS OPR_O_REPLY_WRITER_NO, U.USER_NICKNAME AS OPR_O_USER_NICKNAME, OPR.O_REPLY_REGISTER AS OPR_O_REPLY_REGISTER, OPR.O_REPLY_MODIFY AS OPR_O_REPLY_MODIFY, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OPINION_REPLY OPR WHERE OPI.OPINIONNO = OPR.OPINIONNO ) AS REPLY_CNT FROM OPINION OPI LEFT OUTER JOIN OPINION_REPLY OPR ON(OPI.OPINIONNO = OPR.OPINIONNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_T U ON(OPR.O_WRITER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE OPI.OPINIONNO = #{opinionNo} ORDER BY OPR.O_REPLY_REGISTER ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPINION_REPLY (O_REPLY_NO, O_WRITER_NO, OPINIONNO, O_REPLY_CONTENT, O_REPLY_REGISTER, O_REPLY_MODIFY) VALUES( SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{o_reply_writer_no}, #{opinionNo}, #{o_reply_content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE OPINION_REPLY SET O_REPLY_CONTENT = #{o_reply_content} WHERE O_REPLY_NO = #{o_reply_no}
